title: AI & Automation Courses
subtitle: AIDT&D Learning Tracks
description: Structured, hands-on programs designed to take you from foundations to project-ready in AI agents, RPA, and intelligent document processing.

courses.name: AI & Programming Foundations
courses.description: Build solid fundamentals in programming and AI concepts so you can follow and implement modern AI & automation solutions with confidence.
courses.idealFor: Ideal for students or professionals transitioning into AI & automation from non-CS or non-dev backgrounds.

courses.name: AI Agents & RAG Systems
courses.description: Learn how to build practical AI agents: chatbots, knowledge assistants, and workflow copilots using modern LLM tooling.
courses.idealFor: Best suited for learners who already understand basic coding and want to work specifically on GenAI solutions.

courses.name: RPA & Intelligent Document Processing
courses.description: Combine RPA platforms and IDP tools to automate repetitive, document-heavy workflows end-to-end.
topics: Invoice, KYC & email automation use cases
courses.idealFor: Great for those targeting automation roles in operations, finance, and shared services teams.

courses.name: Capstone & Internship Readiness
courses.description: Work on a guided project that mimics a real client engagement and prepare your portfolio and profile for internships.
topics: Resume, LinkedIn & interview prep for roles
courses.idealFor: Often taken along with or after internships to clearly showcase your skills to future employers.

howItWorks.heading: How the learning journey works
